verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Gbangba Gbangba (Bigger Bigger)
Janran Janran (Longer than the longest)
Kabiti Kabiti to da aye (Mighty Mighty who created the earth)
Fenfe Fenfe toda orun (Wider and Wider who created the heavens)
eyin l’oba lori ohun gbogbo (You are King over all things)
Ka bi o Osi (The Unquestionable God)

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Efi iyin f’Oluwa (Give thanks unto the Lord)
Nitori ti O seun (For He is good)
Nitori anu Re duro o lai lai (and His mercy endures forever)

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Ko su wa lati ma ko orin ti Igbani
Ogo f'olorun Halleluyah!
A le fi igbagbo korin na
Soke kikan
Ogo f'olorun Halleluyah!

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Omo Olorun ni eto lati
Ma bu s'ayo
Pe ona yi nye wa si
Oka wa nsaferi re
Nigbose a o de afin oba wa ologo
Ogo f'olorun Halleluyah!

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
Oba t'o j'o ba lo
Oba t'o j'o ba lo
Your excellency Kabiyesi o
Oba t'o j'o ba lo

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
Chukwu oma, Onye oma nna
Chukwu oma, Onye oma nna
Chukwu oma aaaaa
Chi obi oma

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
That is why we call his name
Chi naememma
Chi nazamekpere
Chi dimma
Chi nasanjo
Chi naenyemike
Chi nweudo
Chi nekeoma
Chi obioma

verse.name: v1h
verse.lines:
No one compares to you
In all the universe
Searched all over
Nobody is like you

verse.name: v1i
verse.lines:
Arabataribiti oooo
Aribitirabata oooo
I searched all over
Nobody is like you

verse.name: v1j
verse.lines:
Who can compare to you
No one
Who can stand before you
Arabataribiti oooo
Because you are my God
I will arise and shine
My life is in your hands
You will not let me down

verse.name: v1k
verse.lines:
Arabataribiti oooo
Aribitirabata oooo
I searched all over
Nobody is like you

verse.name: v1l
verse.lines:
Arabataribiti oooo
Aribitirabata oooo
Only you are God
Nobody can question you

verse.name: v1m
verse.lines:
What you say you will do, that is what you will do
Alpha and Omega, You are the living wonders
Unchangeable changer, you are the mighty one
Everlasting father, the never failing God
Agu na echemba 1
Osimiri atata
